title: Interpretation of seeing my long hair in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing long hair in a dream through the vision website roy2a.com. Seeing long hair in a dream has many meanings. Seeing it can be a good sign or an evil omen. Interpreters differed in the interpretation of seeing long hair in a dream according to the condition and circumstances of the viewer, and whether the man or woman is single, married or pregnant. Today, through the Vision website, we discuss in detail the interpretation of seeing long hair in a dream, based on the opinion of major interpreters such as Ibn Sirin and Ibn Kathir. Al-Nabulsi and Imam Al-Sadiq, so follow us. What is Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of seeing long hair in a dream? Seeing long black hair in a dream indicates very good and ample nutrition for the viewer. The dreamer sees that his hair is long and soft in a dream and it shows that he is in good health and has a healthy body and free of diseases. Seeing a sick person With long hair in a dream indicates his recovery from this disease, and God knows best. Seeing long and curly hair in a dream indicates that the dreamer feels anxious and stressed in the coming period. The dreamer sees that his hair has become long in a dream. It shows that a secret will be revealed to him soon. Seeing a sick person with hair as long as his own Horses in a dream announce that his guardianship is near, and God knows best. Seeing long hair in a dream may also indicate the dreamer’s long life, and God knows best. See also: Interpretation of seeing hair puffed up in a dream. What is the interpretation of seeing long hair in a dream for a single woman? Seeing a single woman with long hair in a dream says that it is Maintains confidence. Seeing a woman alone with long hair in a dream can also indicate her life full of happiness and goodness in the future. Seeing a woman alone with long hair in a dream indicates that she is an ambitious, kind-hearted and popular personality. Seeing one person combing her long hair in a dream announces that she will get married This person and her life with him will be full of stability and happiness. Seeing someone cutting her long hair in a dream indicates the entry of an evil man into her life and he will be the cause of her unhappiness and sadness. See also: Interpretation of seeing hair pulled from the ear in a dream. What is the interpretation of seeing long hair in a dream for a married woman? Seeing a woman A married woman who does not have long hair in a dream indicates that God will get her pregnant soon, and God knows best. Seeing a married woman cutting her hair in a dream indicates that she will remain barren and will never give birth, and God knows best. Seeing a married woman with long, soft hair in a dream says that she is living a good life and enjoying her husband’s money. Seeing a married woman with long hair in a dream says that he is currently living in a good and calm psychological state. Seeing a married woman dreaming of her husband with long hair announces that her children will have a great status in society. See also: Interpretation of seeing hair loss in a dream. What is the interpretation of seeing long hair in a dream for a pregnant woman? Seeing a pregnant woman with long hair in a dream indicates that she will give birth to a boy, and God knows best. Seeing a pregnant woman with long hair in a dream shows that she will undergo an easy and affordable birth process. Seeing a pregnant woman with long black hair in a dream indicates that he will live a life full of security and prosperity.

title: Seeing one's wife and cousin in a dream according to Ibn Sirin

preview.html: In our topic today, we will present the interpretation of seeing the wife, maternal brother, and children in detail as follows. Seeing the uncle’s wife by Ibn Sirin When you dream of your uncle’s wife in a dream, this means that there is a gift to the fortuneteller on the way and he will be very happy with it. It also indicates the fortuneteller’s love and appreciation for the uncle’s wife. The meaning of seeing the cousin in Dreaming of a cousin is actually like a brother, so it is a source of protection, positive energy and bonds. When one sees his cousin in a dream, it means that success, kindness, and living will come to him. It is a praiseworthy vision because it is in the comfort of a brother. Dreaming of a cousin in a dream for a single woman, an unmarried girl who She dreams of seeing her cousin in her sleep indicates her good luck. Perhaps it indicates success and the fulfillment of common desires between them. But if he sees that she is proposing to get engaged, it indicates that there is a great love in her heart for him and it will translate into marriage. Interpretation of a sick cousin in a dream: Whoever sees his cousin sick or dead in a dream, This is clear evidence of his condition. Perhaps he was suffering from a serious illness or was experiencing a major crisis. However, if he was under the protection of God Almighty in the dream, it is a sign of the appearance of a major change in his life for the better. Perhaps he will succeed at work or get rid of his crises and worries. Seeing a cousin in a dream When he saw His cousin in a dream while he is sleeping symbolizes a good public and the attention that draws the attention of the viewer. It also indicates good news and good luck. Seeing her cousin’s daughter getting married in a dream, it is a good sign of her marriage in reality. Seeing a married cousin in a dream If a married woman sees in a dream that her cousin He visits her and she has a beautiful and elegant appearance, so this is a sign that the fortuneteller is pregnant and will give birth to a female. But if he sees her sick in a dream, this indicates in reality that her cousin is sick and suffering with pain. As for seeing her dead in a dream, it is good skin, to change her life for the better. Add the dream that you would like to interpret with the reference Refer to the social status in a comment below the article, and we will respond to it and clarify it.

title: Interpretation of the letter Qaf in a dream according to Al-Nabulsi

preview.html: The bottle in Al-Nabulsi’s dream The bottle is a symbol of a woman, based on what the Messenger of God, may God bless him and grant him peace, said: “Be gentle with bottles.” Either she is a woman who does not keep a secret or a ten, or she warns of death and the imminent period, or she is an adulteress, especially when she sees a bottle full of urine, and a bottle of wine is a sign of that. The bottle of death is a symbol of gossip, or that it is a people without love, faith or covenant, breaking the bottle is the collapse of heresies and seditions, and God knows best. Seeing a grave in a dream The grave is one of the signs that torment the dreamer with panic and anxiety. Dwelling in graves is a prison and captivity that afflicts the dreamer, and building a grave is a large house, and digging a grave for marriage for the bachelor and standing on the grave is a sin. The unknown grave is hypocritical people, and digging graves on the roof indicates longevity, and the rain falling on the graves is mercy from God Almighty, and burying graves is the health of the dreamer, and burying graves alive indicates distress, worry and anxiety, and digging graves in search of knowledge or money. Living in the grave is forbidden money, and God knows best. Killing in a dream Killing in a dream is repentance and staying away from sins and immorality. Killing a person is an unforgivable sin and a sign of the victim's benefit. As for killing by slaughter, it symbolizes injustice, oppression, and killing by unknown means, leaving the law and moving away from religion. The covenant and God knows best. The Holy Quran in a dream The Holy Quran is honor, victory, and the removal of worry, sadness, and distress, and reading without the Quran is a dispute in the truth and a sign for the believer and a humble heart that remembers God Almighty. Reading the Quran at the hands of an illiterate sheikh foretells the approach of his life, and completing the Quran is a great reward and forgiveness, and writing the Quran is a comprehensive explanation of its interpretation, and writing the Quran on earth is disbelief, and reading the Quran is the satisfaction of a need and the fulfillment of a debt, and memorizing the Quran is a great kingdom, power, status, and pride, and listening to the Quran is a cure for diseases and God knows best. The earring in a dream for Al-Nabulsi The earring or earring in a dream is a sign of trade and profit, and it is a symbol of males, and the silver earring is the righteous boy who memorizes half of the Quran, and the gold earring memorizes the entire Quran, and an earring in the dream of an unmarried woman is marriage, and the earring in a woman's dream is a symbol of a man, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about pumpkin by Al-Nabulsi Pumpkin is a symbol of a good and respected scholar. Pumpkin in a sick person's dream is a cure for his illness. Eating cooked pumpkin is a return from a mistake or sin and righteousness in religion after corruption. Eating raw pumpkin portends harm from the jinn or hostility and enmity that the fortuneteller will receive from those around him. Pumpkin is a symbol of the poor, the jinn, the pumpkin's escape from diseases or from them. The evil of seeing zucchini in a dream can portend anxiety, slander, lack of resources, pain or imprisonment and captivity. Eating zucchini with spices indicates sorrows and worries, and without spices comes life, and God knows best. Cane in a dream for Nabulsi The walking stick is one of the symbols that indicate the wicked and is a symbol that is not often seen praiseworthy. Leaning on a stick in a dream indicates short life and the approaching term. The Persian shovel is a symbol of hypocrisy and hypocrisy, or money that follows

Pumpkin is a symbol of the poor, the jinn, the pumpkin’s deliverance from diseases or from them. The evil of seeing zucchini in a dream can portend anxiety, slander, lack of resources, pain or confinement and captivity. Eating zucchini with spices indicates sorrows and worries, and without spices comes life, and God knows best. A cane in a dream for Nabulsi. A walking stick is one of the symbols that indicates evil people, and it is a symbol that seeing it often does not deserve praise. Leaning on a stick in a dream indicates lack of life and the approaching term. The Persian spade is a symbol of hypocrisy and hypocrisy, or the money that follows

title: Interpretation of a dream about my father kissing me on the cheek in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about my father kissing me on the cheek in a dream. You, dear reader, can discover the interpretation of a dream about my father kissing me on the cheek in a dream.Interpretation of a dream about my father kissing me on the cheek in a dreamInterpretation of dreams about my father kissing me on the cheek in a dream Seeing children kissing can indicate To bonding, and God knows the unseen. If the dreamer sees the father kissing the children, this may lead to their bonding, and God knows best. When a married man sees the father kissing his hand, this may be a sign of the father’s need for his children, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. When an unmarried girl sees her father kissing her in a dream, it may represent That is a connection, and God knows the unseen. Interpretation of a dream about my father smiling at me in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about my father smiling at me in a dream could be a sign of happy news, and God knows best. If a married man sees his father smiling in a dream, this may indicate goodness and happiness, God willing. When a single girl sees him, he smiles. Her father, she can lead a good walk that she will enjoy, and God knows best. If a married woman sees a father smiling at her in a dream, this may represent good morals and conduct, and God knows the unseen. Interpretation of a dream about my deceased father hitting me in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about my deceased father hitting me in a dream could indicate a warning The son from committing sins, and God knows everything. If the dreamer sees the deceased father hitting him, then he can warn the son against doing wrong actions, and God knows the unseen. If an unmarried girl sees her father hitting her in a dream, this may mean that he warns against sins, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. If a woman sees If an unmarried girl sees her father beating her, The beating was painful, and it may be a reference to matters in her territory that her father does not approve of, and God knows everything that he does not see. Also, the beating in a dream indicates love, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. When a divorced woman sees being beaten in a dream, it may express affection and closeness to her father, and God knows best. Everything that is not seen.Interpretation of a dream about my father hitting my mother in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about my father hitting my mother in a dream may express understanding and harmony, and God knows the unseen. Seeing a father hitting a mother indicates an understanding of the father and mother, and God knows best. When an unmarried girl sees a father hitting her mother, this may be a sign. On love and tenderness, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. If a married woman sees her father beating her mother, she may resort to the affection that unites a father with her mother, and God knows the unseen. Interpretation of a dream in which I carry my father in my arms in a dream. Interpretation of a dream in which my father was carrying me in his arms in a dream may indicate that he carries responsibilities. And God knows the unseen. If a married man sees his father carrying him in a dream, he can express his responsibility that his father carried, and God knows all that he did not see. When an unmarried girl sees her father carrying it, this may indicate that he bears responsibility, and God knows best.

title: Interpretation of a dream about tall buildings in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about high-rise buildings in a dream is one of the most desirable things, especially nowadays, after the spread of high-rise buildings, you may also be interested in learning about blood in a dream. But the interpretation varies from person to person, just like the interpretations of seeing buildings in a dream. Interpretations vary. Some interpreters differ. It is possible for the vision to be good, bad, or achieve success in the future. Read also: Bathing in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about tall buildings in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about tall buildings. There are many interpretations about seeing tall buildings according to different visions, and here are the most important interpretations: Interpreted by the scholar Ibn You will see that a person who sees tall buildings in a dream is an indication that the dreamer is being betrayed and deceived by people close to him. If a sick person sees in a dream a high place or tall buildings, this is a sign of the seriousness of the disease, his death, or the near end of his life, and God Almighty and All-Knowing. If one sees that he is standing on top of a tall building or high-rise building, or that he is standing on top of a tower, this is evidence that the fortuneteller can make the right decision and that he is making the right one. And the right path and has the ability to overcome problems and enemies. If one sees in his dream that he is standing on top of a tall, empty building, this means that he will die soon. If one sees in his dream that he is climbing a tall building or a tall building and climbing it, this is evidence of achieving goals and success that He seeks it. Anyone who dreams of sitting on top of a tall building is a sign of your psychological comfort and peace of mind. You may be interested in: Pregnancy in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about tall buildings for a man. Some interpreters believe that a man’s vision of a tall and tall building is often an indication that he will obtain a great and distinguished position in the world. currency. There are many interpretations that explain a person’s vision of tall buildings, such as: A man seeing tall buildings in his dream is a sign that he will move from his current stage of his life to a better stage. If the high-rise building is old, this is a sign of major problems that will happen to the pioneer and the emergence of great difficulties in His life as well. But if a person sees in a dream that he is falling from the top of a tall building, then this is a sign of the dreamer’s death, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. Interpretation of a dream about tall buildings for a single woman When an unmarried girl sees tall buildings in her dream, this is a sign that she will soon marry a wealthy man who will achieve Her dreams, and collapsing in front of her in a dream is a sign of failure in a love story or failure. Of flirtation, as she faces difficulties at this time, but when an unmarried girl sees in her dream a tall building and climbs it, this is evidence of achieving her goals. You may also be interested in: Penguin in a dreamInterpretation of a dream about tall buildings for a married womanSome interpreters interpret that if a married woman dreams of climbing A high-rise building, this is evidence that she will gain wealth or inheritance in the coming days. If a woman sees that tall buildings are leaning, it may be a sign of bad luck in life in general, however

title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing a crocodile in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about seeing a crocodile in a dream, and a crocodile in a dream indicates the evil and damage that one suffers from psychologically and many pains, and the bite of a crocodile indicates suffering, and seeing crocodiles causes fear and anxiety for it. The largest, because it is a reptile predator, feeds on creatures such as: This is a human, and therefore we will quote for you the most important interpretation of the dream of seeing a crocodile in a dream, follow us in the next dream. Nabulsi’s dream of seeing a crocodile. Al-Nabulsi believes that a crocodile in a dream has different meanings, such as deceiving friends, being exposed to thieves, traitors, and unjust businessmen. Whoever believes that a crocodile in a dream dragged him into the water and killed him, this indicates suffering and exhaustion in his life. If you see a crocodile in a dream, this It indicates a lack of fear and pain. Whoever thinks that the crocodile dragged him into the water, then the ruler or strong man will take the strength to take his house or his property. Whoever thinks that the crocodile hit him and touched his flesh, skin, or other things, he will obtain money from the enemy. A dream about seeing a crocodile is for single people. title: Learn about the interpretation of a dream about hair loss

preview.html: Hair loss in a dream and its interpretation Hair loss in a dream is considered a frightening act for some women, as there are many interpretations of this vision. Interpretation of hair loss If a married woman dreams that her hair has fallen out, this indicates the end of the sad days in which she lived for a long time and the arrival of comfort and happiness.. When a pregnant woman sees in her dream that her hair is falling out, this means that the time of her birth will pass easily and quickly, and if the hair falling from her head in the dream is white, this indicates that she will give birth. Male giving birth to a female. If the dreamer sees in a dream that the hair falling out of his hair was curly, this is evidence that God will compensate the dreamer with something he lost. A good dream is to see armpit hair falling out or being shaved. Because it indicates that the dreamer will pay him all his debts and goodness and abundance will come to him, which will make him not need debt from anyone again. When a married woman dreams that her hair is falling out, this means that her husband is strongly attached to her. If a married woman sees that her hair is falling out and notices a feeling of sadness After seeing it falling out, this is evidence that she will lose something valuable for the following periods of her life. Seeing the fortuneteller’s hair falling out along the way, this shows how much sadness and sorrow the fortuneteller will soon suffer. If a man sees that his hair has fallen out from being plucked, this is evidence that he He will suffer a great financial loss that will make him deeply sad. The sick dreamer who sees in a dream that his hair is falling out, this is evidence that he will soon get rid of the disease and return to his life in good health. Interpretation of hair loss for single womenIf an unmarried girl sees that her hair is falling out in a dream, this indicates Happy news will come to her in the coming days, whether it is her engagement, approaching engagement, or promotion. When an unmarried woman sees in her dream that her hair is falling out and she is trying to prevent it from falling out, but she has not succeeded, this means that she will face a big problem in her life that she is trying to solve, but will fail in it. If an unmarried woman sees in her dream that there is a person who every time he touches her hair, it begins to fall out, this means that she will meet a person who is stronger than her in his mind and wisdom and who will help her overcome everything. The obstacles she faces in her life that she could not solve on her own. Interpretation of a dream about short hair in a dream: When an unmarried woman sees in her dream that she is cutting her hair so that it becomes short and has a beautiful appearance, this vision is good news from God that she will get rid of all the pressures and problems that she wanted to get rid of before this. But he could. Not. If an unmarried woman sees in her dream that the length of her hair causes her distress until she cuts it and shortens her hair, this means that she has suffered from responsibilities that are beyond her ability to bear and she will soon get rid of these problems. Seeing short hair for an unmarried woman indicates that she will get married soon, especially if she Good news of marriage awaits. If the dreamer sees in a dream that he cut his hair himself and then sees his appearance in the dream and it is beautiful and attractive, this means that he will make a fateful decision in his life and this decision will be followed by successes and victories and to get rid of...

title: Interpretation of seeing a scorpion in a dream about a scorpion sting in a dream

preview.html: Questions related to the scorpion in a dream. The black scorpion in a dream. The yellow scorpion in a dream. The scorpion sting in a dream. Seeing a scorpion in a dream and killing it. Interpretation of a dream about scorpions in the house. Interpretation of a dream about a lot of scorpions. The scorpion in a dream. Interpretation of Imam al-Sadiq. The scorpion in a dream for a pregnant woman. Scorpion: He is the mutant, and he is the ideal man who kills some of his relatives. If he dreams that A scorpion burned in the fire means his enemy will die, so if he sees that he took a scorpion and threw it. To his wife, he commits immoral acts on her part, and anger is greater hostility, and if he stings her, he has money that he does not save, and if he sees a scorpion in his pants, this indicates the corruption of his wife, and likewise if he sees her in his bed, and if he sees that he swallowed a scorpion, then this leads to his enemy secreting forbidden money from the enemy’s gossip due to inheritance. Or something else, and the scorpion's sting, or the scorpion's tongue. Gossip and the scorpion are originally an enemy that does not change because of the vulgarity of its tongue, and all harmful insects are enemies according to the extent of their suffering. A scorpion in a dream shows the worry and sadness of gossip, and a scorpion is gossip among people, and the sting of a scorpion is a virtue that a person will find, and if a scorpion strikes him, the enemy will chase him, or they hate him, and burning scorpions in His house represents the death of his enemies, and if he eats cooked or grilled scorpion meat, he will take money from an enemy like a lawful inheritance, and if it is raw then it is also. It is forbidden. If he sees a scorpion on his shirt or in his place, then it is an enemy and they live and earn, and if he sees it on his bed, then it is an enemy among his family. If he sees scorpions in his stomach, then they are his enemies from his workers, and if they come out from his back, then they are his enemies from his grandchildren or the enmity that occurs between them. Whoever eats a raw scorpion will appear. An immoral person, and a scorpion is a man who does not know his friend from his enemy, and a scorpion is an enemy who is weak to misdemeanors. Whoever dreams that he kills a scorpion, he will triumph over his enemy. And whoever sees that he has a scorpion in his hand that stings people, then he is one who stabs people and irritates one another. And whoever sees: he looks like a scorpion and is not a scorpion. He is a man who thinks that he is his enemy and not an enemy, and the scorpion’s thorn is the tongue of slander. Scorpio: If you see a scorpion in a dream, this means that fake friends will find opportunities to destroy your future and success. If you do not kill the scorpion, the enemy will attack you and this will cause harm to you. The scorpion (as for the scorpion, it is a weak and backward enemy. Whoever dreams that he is stung by a scorpion, his enemy supports him and something bad will happen to him if he sees it and does not sting him, but this is what he fears, so the enemy chases him, and the scorpion’s meat is preferred. While cooking it on a small amount of money, and if it is raw, his enemy enters it and conveys the words to him. Khalil bin Shaheen Al-Dhahiri Seeing a scorpion As for a scorpion, it indicates: a weak enemy without religion, harmful with his tongue, and with a heavy sting, who does not distinguish between the enemy and the friend. And whoever dreams: in his hand is a scorpion that stings people, then he is a man. He follows people and says things about them that are not appropriate. And whoever sees that he ate the meat of a grilled scorpion, then eats from his enemy’s money, and if he does not grill it, then he avoids the enemy. And whoever dreams that scorpions come out of his mouth or enter his clothes, this indicates the presence of an enemy in his house. And he stands with him and sits with him. And whoever sees: that there is a scorpion on his clothes, this indicates the corruption of his enemy in his religion. And whoever dreams: that there is a scorpion on his shirt, this indicates the corruption of his family, whether an enemy or with a slave girl. Interpretation of the dream Plus

title: What is the interpretation of seeing the name Hanan in a dream?

preview.html: Seeing the name Hanan by Ibn Shirin. Interpretation of seeing the name Hanan in a dream. It indicates the good and good qualities of the dreamer. Dreaming about seeing the name Hanan indicates optimism and a bright future. Seeing the name Hanan written in a dream indicates the dreamer’s strong personality and ability to bear responsibility. Interpretation of a dream about the name Hanan for a single woman. A dream for an unmarried girl. Her name Hanan is evidence of an abundance of food and money. Seeing the name Hanan is evidence that a girl is characterized by compassion and love for others. If a girl sees single, the name Hanan in a dream is written clearly, and this indicates the happiness that she shares with others, as she cares a lot about those around her. The name Hanan in a dream The girl indicates her sincerity in her honesty, and it also indicates that this girl is performing all religious duties. Seeing the name Hanan for a married woman. Seeing the name Hanan in a married woman’s dream is evidence of blessings and abundance of livelihood. A dream in which the name Hanan appears in a dreamWomenA married woman enjoys the good qualities that she possesses and her ability to take care of Her husband and children. Dreaming about seeing the name Hanan indicates the joy and happiness that this woman experiences and also indicates the stability of marital life. A dream about the name Hanan for a man. Name Hanan is a dream for a man indicates his marriage to a girl who loves life and will be very loyal to him. As for dreaming of a married man named Hanan in a dream, it indicates His great love and devotion to his wife. If you see a dream with the name Hanan written in pen, it may be a sign that the dreamer’s wife will become pregnant soon. The name Hanan in general in a man’s dream is an indication of good events. The name Hanan in a dream of an unmarried young man can indicate his relationship with a girl He has good standards, where he is kind-hearted, loves goodness for everyone, but loves adventures and loves the spirit of risk, and he will be very. Happy with her. Add the dream that you would like to interpret by referring to your marital status in a comment below the article and we will respond to it and clarify it.

title: Interpretation of the dream of seeing reeds in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Imam Al-Sadiq

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about seeing sugar cane in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Imam al-Sadiq, and seeing sugar cane in a dream can indicate a lot of discussion, and seeing sugar cane juice indicates benefit and benefit, and seeing gold sugar cane indicates wealth and goodness. The behavior of the seer, sugar cane in plants in areas of high temperatures, is the main extracted sugar, and the other source is sugar beets. Agriculture requires fertile land and a lot of water, and it remains on the ground for a whole year, and the sugar factory is located in the middle of the sugar cane farm. Sugar cane bagasse is used in the alcohol industry and Brazil is the largest source of sugar cane. Sugar cane, a very common plant, is a source of natural sugar production and has many benefits for human health, and many people like to drink sugar cane juice because it is delicious and also beneficial to the human body. Nutrition. Gather the main interpreters to see the comments and interpretations of the interpretation of the dream of seeing reeds in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Imam Al-Sadiq - Royaty Magazine, where reeds indicate the acquisition of money, but after hardships. Interpretation of the dream of reeds by Ibn Sirin Seeing reeds in a dream also indicates that the rebels did not fulfill their promises. Seeing reeds in a dream also indicates that the person did not achieve the religious faith. Seeing sugar cane in a dream means that the dreamer puts himself in a bad position where people can talk and gossip. Seeing the dreamer pressing and tightening the reed means that he will benefit. Seeing the reeds turning into strips of gold or silver indicates the dreamer's good behavior. Seeing sugar cane is good news for earning money after fatigue and hard work. Seeing reeds planted in places unsuitable for agriculture indicates that this place is in bad condition. Seeing him leaning on The cane indicates his illness and death. Seeing a walking stick leaning also means gossip. Seeing the cutting of the cane bodes well. Interpretation of a dream about green sugar cane Seeing green cane in their dreams indicates that they have changed the situation in a positive way and gained happiness and joy. Seeing green sugar cane in a dream indicates the disappearance of tension and sadness. See also: Interpretation of a dream about seeing sugar in a dream Interpretation of a dream about a red stick Seeing a red cane in a dream means that something new will happen in the dreamer's life. Red cane in a dream also indicated some fatigue. Interpretation of a dream about eating sugar cane Cane juice in a dream indicates livelihood, goodness and wealth. Sugar cane juice in a dream also expressed his satisfaction. Interpretation of a dream about buying cane Seeing buying cane in a dream indicates the emergence of some disagreements and quarrels. Seeing a cane in a dream means that the situation is constantly changing.
